feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The transcript shows concrete financial outputs (NPV, IRR, payback) across multiple case studies and describes an implemented front-end/backend pipeline using AI, indicating the tool functions as a financial application. Driver stages (Discover, Implement, Reflect) corroborate both the intent and working implementation, meeting the standards for a PASS.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows clear, functional AI integration (Gemini + n8n) that produces analyst reasoning and interprets NPV/IRR results across multiple case studies, demonstrating added value beyond surface automation. The DISCOVER, IMPLEMENT, and REFLECT stages support a thorough, applied integration—meeting PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So based on the quantitative analysis this project creates shareholder value with positive NPV of 122,213 and then the return is 64.4% and it exceeds our hurdle rate of 10% in indicating efficient capital use."
"first I went through the driver framework to to build this."
"This is the capital budgeting analysis tool that I created using uh Gemini and other AI tools."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: student identified the need for an AI-driven capital budgeting tool.  
Implement: student built an HTML front end and connected an n8n backend/Gemini AI to compute NPV, IRR, payback and present results.  
Reflect: student references using the DRIVER framework and AI analyst reasoning to validate the tool’s financial outputs.
criteria.reasoning: The transcript shows concrete financial outputs (NPV, IRR, payback) across multiple case studies and describes an implemented front-end/backend pipeline using AI, indicating the tool functions as a financial application. Driver stages (Discover, Implement, Reflect) corroborate both the intent and working implementation, meeting the standards for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So utilizing AI, I created this cap budget AI um on HTML."
"first I went through the driver framework to to build this."
"utilizing Gemini I was able to build the front end in HTML for immediate feedback and then connect it back to the uh nan backend for the AI reasoning."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: student identified AI use early ("utilizing AI...") and the need to move beyond spreadsheets.  
Implement: described concrete implementation (Gemini frontend, n8n backend) and running analyses.  
Reflect: referenced the DRIVER framework and reasoning role of an AI agent as a senior analyst.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows clear, functional AI integration (Gemini + n8n) that produces analyst reasoning and interprets NPV/IRR results across multiple case studies, demonstrating added value beyond surface automation. The DISCOVER, IMPLEMENT, and REFLECT stages support a thorough, applied integration—meeting PASS criteria.
